entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • File Input in Blazor SSR not validating #54607
  • HttpUtility.JavaScriptStringEncode single quote behavior does not match documentation #54605
  • Perf regression: json #54604
  • Route Params are not able to validate Guid[] parameters #54602
  • Add APIs for viewing generated OpenAPI file at runtime #54600
    9.0-preview4
  • Announcement: Swashbuckle.AspNetCore is being removed in .NET 9 #54599
  • Add built-in support for generating OpenAPI document from APIs #54598
    9.0.0
  • Endpoint metadata added with `.MapXXX().AddYYY()` can't be accessed in `ActionDescriptor` #54594
  • Blazor WASM: Catch explicit navigation to authentication/login-callback and redirect to login #54586
  • TypeLoadException on web application startup when using Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Razor.RuntimeCompilation package #54585
  • [NETSDKE2E]warning CS8618: Non-nullable property 'Http' must contain a non-null value when exiting constructor when building blazorWasm project. #54603

Closed

  • Generated swagger/redoc page doesn't respect inherited descriptions #48982
    Backlog
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, json, multiple_queries #54583
  • Perf regression: single_query #54584
  • Models used in Minimal API Endpoint Metadata do not respect the Swashbuckle Annotations Attributes #52713
  • Multiple ways to short-circuit pipeline is a poor design and should be reconsidered #54548
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper, updates #54575

PullRequests

Created

  • [Blazor] Fix template tests #54606
    area-infrastructure
  • update IdentityModel to latest #54601
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [Blazor][MT] reduce synchronous calls from JS #54596
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-wasm-threading, 9.0.0
  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-preview.3.24165.20 #54588
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:

Merged

  • Enable unified build #54084
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun, 9.0-preview3
  • Update Alpine versions #54578
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview3
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `e1a38bc` to `c231e6f` #54552
    area-infrastructure, 9.0-preview3

Updated

  • Increase logs and delays in CanLaunchPhotinoWebViewAndClickButton #54608
    area-blazor, 8.0.x
  • Improve route analyzer performance with highly concatenated strings #54479
    area-infrastructure
  • Bump follow-redirects from 1.15.5 to 1.15.6 #54571
    area-infrastructure, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies
  • add readme package for NuGet package Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.NewtonsoftJson #54504
    area-mvc
  • Add AddHubOptions extension on IServiceCollection #54163
    area-signalr, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • #54445 ChecksumValidator: Support checksum SHA256 even when the metadata uses Sha256 #54446
    community-contribution, area-ui-rendering
